actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program of formula grants for compensating certain trauma care centers for reimbursed costs incurred with respect to undocumented aliens, and for other purposes.
short_title: Trauma Care Center Alien Compensation Act of 1992

summary.text: Trauma Care Center Alien Compensation Act of 1992 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make an allotment each year for each eligible trauma center to compensate, partially or fully, for unreimbursed costs of care to undocumented aliens. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Trauma Care Center Alien Compensation Act of 1992

A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program of formula grants for compensating certain trauma care centers for reimbursed costs incurred with respect to undocumented aliens, and for other purposes.
